negotiator.boaframework.offeringstrategy.anac2012.CUHKAgent

Class OpponentBidHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.boaframework.offeringstrategy.anac2012.CUHKAgent.OpponentBidHistory

  • public class OpponentBidHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    Operations related with the opponent's bid history. The opponent's first 100 unique bids are remembered.
    Author:
    Justin
